scripts.clean: rm -f app.apk && cd android && ./gradlew clean && rm -rf build && rm -rf app/build && cd ..
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean-cache && npm run clean && npm run uninstall-all-apk
scripts.build-debug-apk: cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cp ./app/build/outputs/apk/app-debug.apk ../app.apk && echo done
scripts.rebuild-debug-apk: npm run clean && npm run build-debug-apk
scripts.build-release-apk: cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cp ./app/build/outputs/apk/app-release.apk ../app.apk && echo done
scripts.rebuild-release-apk: npm run clean && npm run build-release-apk
scripts.install-debug-apk: npm run uninstall-all-apk && cd android && ./gradlew installDebug && cd ..
scripts.install-release-apk: npm run uninstakk-all-apk && cd android && ./gradlew installRelease && cd ..
scripts.native-rename: rm -rf ios android ; mv index.android.js .index.android.js.tmp 2> /dev/null || true ; react-native upgrade && react-native android ; mv .index.android.js.tmp index.android.js 2> /dev/null || true
scripts.show-debug-key: echo ------ Default passowrd is : android ------ && keytool -list -v -keystore ~/.android/debug.keystore
